title: PM grieved over Mohiuddin’s demise
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 27 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif Wednesday expressed his deep grief and sorrow over the death of Shahzada Mohiuddin of Chitral, former minister of state.
The prime minister said that his death was a huge shock to them as he was like a brother and fast friend.
He said that they could not forget late prince’s contributions for the country and the nation. PM Office Media Wing said in a press release.
The prime minister prayed for the high ranks of the departed soul and for the bereaved family to bear the loss with fortitude.
The prime minister expressed condolence with his son prince Iftikhar and the bereaved family.
Late Mohiuddin had been elected as PML-N, MNA twice from Chitral.
